idea:
I have started my professional journey in 2017, after completion of my bachelor's degree.


After about one and half year.I realised that,I haven't made for this.


So I quit my professional job.


And this is how, I started to think about starting a business.


When I looked around to the existing business models and business empires.I thought that, this is not how the business work.


After analysing about the existing business models.I have started finding my capabilities to change, the existing business models into the model that I want.


After all this I found that, the era and the technology we are living and using it.Is far capable for creating and bringing a new changes in a existing business model.


So I decided to start a business empire, that will capable to manufacture all A-Z products.Which human being needed for their servival @ zero production or manufacturing cost.


This means ne need to pay for the goods and services that we are paying right now.


Yes it's sound foolish, but the technology we are working on it.Is far capable for doing this 


www.testsomethingnew.com


This is my first step towards that.


To know more, click on the link mentioned above.


Thank you for being here....
name: TSN Worldwide

idea:
We take this opportunity to introduce Filtertex India as a Solution Provider in the field of filtration & manufacturer of Filter Fabric along with 35 years of vast dedicated experience in made-ups and selection of suitable filter media for your process.

We always do look for the customer satisfaction in order of business friendship & co-operation with industries:

We can offer today.

Polypropylene (Spun, Multi-Filament, Monofilament & Anti-Static fiber free Fabrics)

Polyester (Spun, Multi-Filament, Monofilament & Anti-Static Fabrics)

Nylon and Cotton to suit your process

Madeups

Expertise in All types of industrial fabric filters like, Non-woven, Woven, Polyester, Polypropylene, Cotton, Glass fabric etc.
name: Filtertex India

idea:
We take this opportunity to introduce ourselves as M/s. HI ZENITH TRADERS PRIVATE LIMITED which is a recently established venture by a group of experienced peoples with a clear intention of providing services of   door step diesel delivery to various stationary, earth moving and mining equipment i.e. DG sets, excavators, stone quarries etc. with utmost quality, quantity and of course timely delivery, where bear minimum costing shall be given the prime preference and the services  shall be ably backed up with a quick & efficient service team.

Since our startup involving services of the fuel delivery to various prospective clients mentioned above, it will really help us to generate employment as well as wealth.

1) Chassis Requirement:  Initially we will be requiring a commercial truck chassis from any reputed manufacturer in India i.e. Tata Motors, Ashok Leyland, Eicher, Mahindra and Mahindra or Bharat Benz, thereby the more we purchase the chassis more the business will be generated to the above chassis manufacturers and also related supplementary small scale industries will be getting more jobs through these manufacturers.

2) Bowser Body Manufacturing: Building a Diesel Bowser body as per the set standards of Dept of PESO, from approved body builders, thus various such vehicle body builders will be getting the job work and the related supplementary small scale industries.

3) The Team Working on the Diesel Bowser : Each Vehicle in each shift will require team of 2 to 3 persons for delivering fuel at various locations, thereby the more no. of vehicles will get added into the fleet, the more people will get the jobs in this service industry.

4) Oil Companies: Since our services are related to the Oil industries and our efforts are to mobilize and sophisticate the existing fuel supplies to the various earth moving equipment, agriculture equipment, DG sets, Stone quarries, Mining at remote locations. This will surely increase the volume sale of the oil companies, thereby increasing movement of logistic companies too.
name: HI ZENITH TRADERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: M/s. Aryan Tours and Travels is a taxi/cab providing firm. It is a very dedicated firm believe in providing prompt service.
name: ARYAN TOURS AND TRAVELS

idea:
Mass Trans Express is one of the most reputed, leading, and reliable organizations in Courier, Cargo, and Logistics Industry managed by an experienced team of qualified, dedicated professionals. Founded in 2013 by Mr. Sriramulu Chilivery, is a seven-year-old Mumbai-based company that has dynamically grown not only at domestic probabilities but overseas as well; known for the complete business solutions in the industry with unlimited service destinations across the county and worldwide. 

Apart from being such a young company, our concepts go through 20 years of experience of our founder in the courier industry which acts as a cherry on top. 

As the name implies, we major at transporting all parcels, documents or shipments in mass quantity with speed and safety. 

We offer quality and cost-effective courier and logistics services to the public sector, healthcare sector, Food, and Retail sector within and beyond the boundaries. We have served 13000 + pin codes with over 15000 shipments delivered worldwide and more than 10000 satisfied customers. 

Mass Trans Express promises excellence in delivery, focusing on the individual customer and becoming a comprehensive integrated service provider in the field of Warehousing, Courier, Logistics, Packing & Moving, etc.
name: MASS TRANS EXPRESS PRIVATE LIMITED
